translations.The Nextcloud contacts app is a user int:

* üë• Cumpartzidura de rubricas!** Cheres cumpartzire is cuntatos tuos cun is amigos o is collegas tuos? Perunu problema!
* üôà **Non nos semus torrende a imbentare sa roda!** Basada subra de sa libreria de c√≤dighe abertu bella a beru de SabreDAV.
